name: Global Game Jam 2020 - Cleaning With You
name_original: Global Game Jam 2020 - Cleaning With You
description:
A system prototype for Global Game Jam made between myself, Rozi, Julie, and Yanzhe. Does not have an ending! 

Cleaning With You is an trashing production simulation. The planet is covered in noxious gases coming from trash.  Try to clean up the planet as best as you can!

You can add people and robots into the system by clicking on their characters. Robots can clean up trash, but can break and turn into trash before too long. People can fix robots but can't deal with trash. How many will be needed to fully fix up the planet?
